name: @teamnovu/nuxt-breaky
description: Show Tailwind CSS Breakpoints in Nuxtjs

scripts.release: yarn test && yarn update:gh-pages && standard-version && git push --follow-tags && npm publish
scripts.release:patch: yarn test && yarn update:gh-pages && standard-version --release-as patch && git push --follow-tags && npm publish
scripts.release:minor: yarn test && yarn update:gh-pages && standard-version --release-as minor && git push --follow-tags && npm publish
scripts.release:major: yarn test && yarn update:gh-pages && standard-version --release-as major && git push --follow-tags && npm publish
scripts.update:gh-pages: yarn generate:gh-pages && git add -A && git diff-index --quiet HEAD || git commit -m "docs: update gh-pages" && git push && yarn deploy:gh-pages
scripts.deploy:gh-pages: git subtree push --prefix example/dist origin gh-pages
